tables.name: customer_vehicle_info
tables.description: Master table containing information related to vehicles and their owners (customers). Use this to link vehicles to customers.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.meaning: Unique identifier for the customer or vehicle in the system.

columns.name: customer_name
columns.meaning: Name of the customer or vehicle owner.

columns.name: customer_mobile
columns.meaning: Contact number of the customer.

columns.name: customer_vehicle_number
columns.meaning: The registration number (license plate) of the vehicle.

columns.name: vehicle_type
columns.meaning: Contains the brand, model, and variant of the vehicle, usually separated by a hyphen.

columns.name: chasis_no
columns.meaning: Unique chassis number of the vehicle.

columns.name: engine_no
columns.meaning: Unique engine number of the vehicle.

columns.name: customer_status
columns.meaning: Status of the customer account, e.g., ACTIVE or BLOCKED.

columns.name: fuel_type
columns.meaning: The fuel type of the vehicle (Petrol, Diesel, CNG, etc.).

columns.name: last_crm_contact_date
columns.meaning: The date when the customer was last contacted by the CRM team.

tables.name: employee_info
tables.description: Contains details of employees working in the organization or specific workshops.

columns.name: employee_id
columns.meaning: Unique identifier for the employee.

columns.name: workshop_id
columns.meaning: The ID of the workshop the employee belongs to. Links to workshop_info table.

columns.name: first_name
columns.meaning: First name of the employee.

columns.name: last_name
columns.meaning: Last name of the employee.

columns.name: designation
columns.meaning: Job title or designation of the employee.

columns.name: status
columns.meaning: Employment status (ACTIVE or BLOCKED). Only active users can access the system.

columns.name: contact_number
columns.meaning: Phone number of the employee.

tables.name: job_card_details
tables.description: Records the initial problems and complaints reported when a vehicle arrives for service. This is the 'Job Card'.

columns.name: job_card_id
columns.meaning: Unique identifier for the job card.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.meaning: Links to the customer_vehicle_info table.

columns.name: vehicle_svc_id
columns.meaning: Links to the vehicle_service_summary table.

columns.name: problem_desc
columns.meaning: Description of the vehicle problem reported by the customer.

columns.name: complaint_status
columns.meaning: Current status of vehicle. R (Returned)

columns.name: workshop_finding
columns.meaning: Technical findings recorded by the workshop mechanic after inspection.

columns.name: created_on
columns.meaning: Date and time when the job card was created.

tables.name: vehicle_service_details
tables.description: Line-item details of spares parts and labour services used during a vehicle service. Contains cost breakdowns.

columns.name: vehicle_svc_details_id
columns.meaning: Unique identifier for this line item.

columns.name: vehicle_svc_id
columns.meaning: Links to the service summary. Use this to group items by a specific service event.

columns.name: service_type_cd
columns.meaning: Flag denoting type: 'PR' for Spare Parts, 'S' for Service/Labour.

columns.name: service_desc
columns.meaning: Name or description of the spare part or service performed.

columns.name: quantity
columns.meaning: Number of units used.

columns.name: amount
columns.meaning: Cost per unit or total cost for this line item.

columns.name: service_date
columns.meaning: Date when this specific service/part was added.

columns.name: tax_rate
columns.meaning: Tax percentage applied to this item.

columns.name: identifier
columns.meaning: 'Billing' means part of a vehicle service. 'CounterSales' means sold directly over the counter.

tables.name: vehicle_service_summary
tables.description: The high-level summary of a service event (Invoice level). Contains totals, dates, and status.

columns.name: vehicle_svc_summary_id
columns.meaning: Primary key. Unique Service ID.

columns.name: customer_id
columns.meaning: ID of the customer whose vehicle is being serviced.

columns.name: service_date
columns.meaning: Date when the service occurred.

columns.name: total_amt
columns.meaning: Final invoice amount (Parts + Labour + Tax).

columns.name: service_amt
columns.meaning: Total charges for Labour/Service only.

columns.name: parts_amt
columns.meaning: Total charges for Spare Parts only.

columns.name: invoice_id
columns.meaning: Generated Invoice Number. Don't use invoice_id to find invoiced orders. Ignore invoice_id column in sql.

columns.name: service_status
columns.meaning: Current status of the vehicle: A (Arrived), R (Ready), B (Blocked), D (Done/Delivered), I (Invoiced)

columns.name: kilometer_driven
columns.meaning: Odometer reading at the time of service.

columns.name: technician
columns.meaning: Name of the technician assigned to this service.

columns.name: bill_type
columns.meaning: Invoice type: 'Standard' (Non-Tax) or 'Detailed' (Tax Invoice).

tables.name: workshop_info
tables.description: Details about the workshop or garage branches.

columns.name: workshop_id
columns.meaning: Unique ID for the workshop.

columns.name: workshop_name
columns.meaning: Name of the workshop business.

columns.name: address
columns.meaning: Physical address of the workshop.

columns.name: city
columns.meaning: City where the workshop is located.

columns.name: contact_nbr
columns.meaning: Phone number for the workshop.

columns.name: gst_number
columns.meaning: GST (Tax) Number of the workshop.
